players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I am the mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. Alice, can you confirm if you saw me or anyone else killing him?"
Diana: "I am not the mafioso. I was with Bob last night and saw nothing suspicious."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
